name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Random color for YouTube's progress bar

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Change red color for a random of the YouTube's progress bar

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension change the video's progress bar on YouTube with a random color.
